letters.description: Collect comprehensive details about the client's doula practice, including experience, skills, client base, challenges, and goals.
Identify strengths, opportunities, and areas for improvement within the client's doula business and personal development.
Motivate the client to develop and implement actionable strategies to achieve their desired outcomes, fostering confidence and commitment.
Create sustainable systems and processes for client acquisition, service delivery, and business management, ensuring long-term success and scalability.
Continuously monitor progress, assess the effectiveness of implemented strategies, and adapt the coaching approach to facilitate ongoing growth and refinement of the client's doula practice.
